keywords.value: Federal Reserve Bank of New York
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: In two studies, New York Fed researchers lay out a situation that shows how fire sales caused by problems at some funds could lead to broader losses.

headline.main: The Risk of a Panic in the Bond Mutual Fund Market
